name: CVE-2021-28861
description: ** DISPUTED ** Python 3.x through 3.10 has an open redirection vulnerability in lib/http/server.py due to no protection against multiple (/) at the beginning of URI path which may leads to information disclosure. NOTE: this is disputed by a third party because the http.server.html documentation page states "Warning: http.server is not recommended for production. It only implements basic security checks."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:alpha2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:alpha3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:alpha4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:alpha5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:alpha6:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:alpha1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:beta2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:beta3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:alpha7:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:3.11.0:beta1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:python:python:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:35:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:36:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:37:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
